name: Cows Encounters TD
description:
Defend your farm against wicked Aliens who tries to abduct your cows.

Basic tower defense: you have to build attack and ressource generator towers to defeat every enemies waves.

2 modes:

  • Normal: defeat all successive waves and reach the end of the game.
  • Infinite: survive as long as you can.

2 levels of difficulty

Save System: You can save your progress at anytime.

I made this game in a few weeks to show part of the skills I've acquired since I started learning Unity.

I'm a big fan of TD games since Warcraft 3, if you are in the same case and you want this game becomes a real TD, fell free to leave a comment... If I have the time, I would be very grateful to integrate the idea.
